backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining story, user, comment, and report types with map‑based storage, ID generators, authorization mixins, and public query helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two map‑click UI features to the affected MapView file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base variables and dark‑mode theme definitions for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication state, profile setup flow, theme provider, and page layout.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryDialo: Dialog for creating stories with geolocation, manual coordinates, image upload, anonymity options, and category selection.
frontend/src/components/CreateStoryFAB.t: Floating action button component that triggers opening the create‑story dialog.
frontend/src/components/FilterBar.tsx: Search and category filter UI for narrowing visible stories.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying attribution with a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, theme toggle, and Internet Identity login/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Dynamically loads Leaflet and renders an interactive map with story markers, user location, and temporary pins on click. Manages marker state and map initialization.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to choose a username and save their profile via mutation. Provides a simple form with validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Displays a story preview card with image, distance, category, and interaction buttons for liking, pinning, commenting, and sharing. Handles user authentication checks and mutation logic.
frontend/src/components/StoryDetailDialo: Full-screen dialog showing detailed story content, interactions, comments, reporting, and deletion. Manages likes, pins, comment submission, and loading states based on user identity.
frontend/src/components/StoryFeed.tsx: Renders a grid of StoryCard components or loading skeletons, with an empty state message when no stories exist. Handles story click forwarding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor depending on Internet Identity state. Invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout methods, and initialization from storage. Wraps AuthClient to manage identity loading, delegation validation, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, stories, and intro state using a backend actor with retry and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Provides helper functions that map story categories to display labels and Tailwind color classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Contains a className merge helper, distance calculation utilities, and a formatter for human-readable distances.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main home page with story feed/map views, filters, geolocation handling, and first‑time user logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors with OKLCH variables, custom radii, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, a high-level platform summary, and a detailed list of existing features with IDs, descriptions, and versions for build planning.
